query.name: systemUser
query.jpql: select c from sec$User c where c.login = :login

query.name: appUser
query.jpql: select c from jokerapp_User c where c.username = :username AND c.encryptedUserPassword = :userPassword

query.name: preferences
query.jpql: select c from jokerapp_Preferences c where c.user.id = :userId

query.name: tableItems
query.jpql: select c from jokerapp$TableItem c order by c.tableNumber

query.name: tableItemAreas
query.jpql: select c from jokerapp$TableItemArea c order by c.areaNumber

query.name: activeOrders
query.jpql: select c from jokerapp$Order c where c.status = 'open' OR c.status = 'bill' order by c.createTs

query.name: order
query.jpql: select c from jokerapp$Order c where c.id = :orderId

query.name: productItemCategories
query.jpql: select c from jokerapp$ProductItemCategory c where c.visible = true order by c.sortOrder

query.name: productItems
query.jpql: select c from jokerapp$ProductItem c where c.visible = true order by c.sortOrder

query.name: productModifierCategories
query.jpql: select c from jokerapp$ProductModifierCategory c order by c.sortOrder

query.name: productModifiers
query.jpql: select c from jokerapp$ProductModifier c order by c.sortOrder
